author: Sports on the Air
title: Sports on the Air - TV/radio schedules
text:
AUTO RACING
3:30 p.m. (NBCSN) — NASCAR Xfinity Series: Drive for the Cure 300 qualifying in Concord, N.C.
7 p.m. (NBCSN) — NASCAR Xfinity Series: Drive for the Cure 300 in Concord, N.C.
COLLEGE FOOTBALL
6 p.m. (CBSSN) — Southern Mississippi at Marshall
7 p.m. (ESPN) — North Carolina State at Virginia Tech
GOLF

5 & 10 p.m. (GOLF) — Presidents Cup in Incheon City, South Korea
